name: Beef Stir-Fry with Brown Rice
description: Quick and colorful beef stir-fry loaded with vegetables. Served over nutritious brown rice for sustained energy.

instructions.instruction: Cook brown rice according to package directions (about 25 minutes).
Mix soy sauce and oyster sauce in a small bowl.
Heat a wok over high heat. Add oil.
Stir-fry beef for 2-3 minutes until browned. Remove and set aside.
instructions.tip: Work in batches for best results.

instructions.instruction: Add more oil if needed. Stir-fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 30 seconds.
Return beef to the wok. Add sauce.
Serve over brown rice, sprinkled with sesame seeds.

tips: Brown rice has more fiber and nutrients than white rice.
Slice beef against the grain for tenderness.
Great for meal prep - keeps well for 4 days.
Add chili flakes for extra heat.
storageInfo: Store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days. Reheat in a pan.
servingSuggestion: Serve with sriracha or chili sauce on the side.
variations: Chicken or tofu can be substituted.
Use cauliflower rice for a low-carb option.
